name: Known by Stars, Shown by Hearts
simple_desc: Activates Matrix of Prescience. DMG received by Fu Xuan's allies is Distributed to her. Also increases CRIT Rate and Max HP of all allies.
desc:
Activates Matrix of Prescience, via which other team members will Distribute #1[i]% of the DMG they receive (before this DMG is mitigated by any Shields) to Fu Xuan for #3[i] turn(s).
While affected by Matrix of Prescience, all team members gain the Knowledge effect, which increases their respective Max HP by #4[f1]% of Fu Xuan's Max HP, and increases CRIT Rate by #5[f1]%.
When Fu Xuan is knocked down, the Matrix of Prescience will be dispelled.
